attributes.action: Make NHS Stop the Herd Immunity policy and enact social distancing immediately
attributes.additional_details: We cannot be guinea pigs in a high-risk experiment. Listen to the World Health Organisation!
attributes.background:
Stop the "Herd Immunity" policy and enact social distancing immediately! 

Hundreds of thousands may die unnecessarily because of your reckless policy.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have updated their advice and includes social distancing. You can read about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-guidance-on-social-distancing-and-for-vulnerable-people/guidance-on-social-distancing-for-everyone-in-the-uk-and-protecting-older-people-and-vulnerable-adults

You might want to know that the Government has set out that 'herd immunity' is not a strategy. You can read a recent comment by the Health Secretary here:  
https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2020-03-16/debates/235689EC-0A18-4488-BFCF-9F012A1A0C1B/Covid-19#contribution-4215E975-1483-4CB0-A03B-1F67E4E9B990   

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
